Theme Kit Development

Theme Kit is open source and you can help contribute on github. Github

Issues

Please log all issues on the github bug tracker. Github Issues

Go Development

While being a command line interface, Theme Kit is also a library that can be used in Go application development. For further documentation you can check out Theme Kitâ€™s Development Documentation

You can get started by getting the library with the following command:

go get -u github.com/Shopify/themekit
